result.execSummary:
The defendant Zachery T Feltes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Child Pornography by Person Under Age of 18, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).
  • Possession of Child Pornography by Person Under Age of 18, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).
  • Possession of Child Pornography by Person Under Age of 18, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Court costs ($268), DNA surcharge ($250) and Image surcharge ($500) are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Full-time employment and/or combination of schooling.
AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended.

Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent including sex offender treatment.
Continue with counseling currently enrolled in.
No unsupervised contact with any minors under the age of 18 without prior Agent approval.
No use of computers, technological devices or equipment that has access to the internet without written approval from Agent, except for purposes of employment.
Not to possess any pornographic or sexually explicit materials.
Comply with Sex Offender Registration.
Attend 2 self help meetings per week.
Provide DNA sample and pay appropriate surcharges.

timeConds.notes:
Non-working hours with standard release conditions.
Defendant to report to Huber facility by 06:00 p.m. on 08-08-2014.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Zachery T Feltes in court with attorney Thomas C Simon.  Margaret Drees appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case called for sentencing. 
The Defendant was given the following:

COUNT 1: 

WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  3 YEARS, Concurrent with counts 2 and 3. 

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
*AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;.
*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent including sex offender treatment; 
*Continue with counseling currently enrolled.
*Full-Time employment and/or combination of schooling 
*No unsupervised contact with any minors under the age of 18 without prior agent approval.
*No use of computers or technological device or equipment that has access to the internet without written 
prior approval from your Agent, except for purposes of employment. 
*Not to possess any pornographic or sexually explicit materials.
*Comply with Sex Offender Registration
*Attend 2 self help meetings per week. 
*DNA sample to be provided and pay appropriate surcharges.

DNA SURCHARGE:  $250 (to be paid as a condition of probation).  

COURT COSTS:  $125 (to be paid as a condition of probation).

IMAGE SURCHARGE:  $500 (to be paid as a condition of probation).

CONDITION TIME on Count 1 only: 60 DAYS - w/standard release conditions, Defendant to report to Huber facility by 6:00 p.m. on Friday, August 8, 2014. 

Felony Warnings, Voting Rights and Firearms Warnings provided to defendant

Court authorizes the return of any personal property belonging to defendant's parents and sister, but must go through the DA for approval of items. 

Expunction is denied. 
***
COUNT 2: 

WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  3 YEARS, Concurrent with counts 1 and 3. 

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
Same as count 1. 

DNA SURCHARGE:  WAIVED.

COURT COSTS:  $125 (to be paid as a condition of probation).

IMAGE SURCHARGE:  $500 (to be paid as a condition of probation).

***
COUNT 3: 

WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  3 YEARS, Concurrent with counts 1 and 2. 

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
Same as count 1. 

DNA SURCHARGE:  WAIVED.

COURT COSTS:  $125 (to be paid as a condition of probation).

IMAGE SURCHARGE:  $500 (to be paid as a condition of probation).
Sentencing hearing on August 5, 2014 at 03:45 pm.

  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 5, 2014 at 03:45 pm.

Defendant Zachery T Feltes in court with attorney Thomas C Simon.  Bryan C Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Simon is requesting a plea and sentencing date in July.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 24, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

No unsupervised contact with any minor females.  No contact with Joey C. dob: 11/14/91.   Not to have any device to access the internet in anyway except for purposes of employment at Steinhafels. Bond to be co-signed with 1 parent (John or Pamela F.) Reside with parents.  Defendant and Parent to sign the amended bond by 4:00 p.m. on March 31,2014.

Defendant Zachery T Feltes in court with attorney Thomas C. Simon.  Erik J. Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Simon does not yet have discovery.  Attorney Simon motions the court to amend the conditions of bail to allow the defendant to use a computer while at work.  The state does not object as long as it is for purposes of his work.  The court modifies the bail conditions of the surety bond.  The defendant and his co-signer have until 4:00 on March 31, 2014 to sign the new bond. 
  Hearing scheduled for May 16, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant Zachery T Feltes in court with attorney Thomas C. Simon.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED. 
  Hearing scheduled for March 28, 2014 at 09:30 am.

No unsupervised contact with any minor females.  No contact with Joey C. dob: 11/14/91.   Not to have any device to access the internet in anyway. Bond to be co-signed with 1 parent (John or Pamela F.) Reside with parents.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.

Defendant Zachery T Feltes in court, in custody.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court tolled time limits for the status of counsel.  Hearing scheduled for March 11, 2014 at 10:00 am.
